name: Airport Travel
description: Everything you need before heading to the airport
items: Check passport validity (6 months minimum)
Print or download boarding pass
Verify flight status and gate information
Pack carry-on bag within size limits
Check baggage weight limits
Prepare liquids in 3-1-1 compliant bag
Charge phone and portable charger
Download offline maps and entertainment
Confirm airport parking or transportation
Arrive 2-3 hours before international flight
Keep medications in original containers
Wear easy-to-remove shoes for security
Have ID and boarding pass ready
Empty water bottles before security
Secure valuables in carry-on

name: Vacation Packing
description: Complete packing list for your vacation
items: Check weather forecast for destination
Pack appropriate clothing for activities
Include underwear and socks (one extra day)
Pack toiletries and medications
Bring phone charger and adapters
Pack sunscreen and sunglasses
Include first aid kit
Bring travel documents (passport, visas)
Pack swimwear if applicable
Include comfortable walking shoes
Bring camera or ensure phone storage
Pack reading material or e-reader
Include reusable water bottle
Bring copies of important documents
Pack small daypack for excursions
Include travel insurance documents
Bring credit cards and some local currency
Pack hat or cap for sun protection

name: Office Daily Checklist
description: Your daily routine checklist for office work
items: Review calendar for today's meetings
Check and respond to urgent emails
Prioritize top 3 tasks for the day
Prepare materials for scheduled meetings
Take regular breaks (every 90 minutes)
Keep workspace organized and clean
Update task management system
Stay hydrated throughout the day
Review tomorrow's schedule before leaving
Back up important work files
Follow up on pending action items
Network or chat with colleagues
Eat a proper lunch away from desk
Check in with team members
End day by planning tomorrow's priorities

name: Car Fuel Stop
description: Quick checklist when fueling up your car
items: Turn off engine completely
Check fuel grade required for your car
Open fuel door and remove cap
Insert nozzle fully into tank
Fill tank to automatic shutoff
Don't top off after auto-shutoff
Replace fuel cap securely until click
Close fuel door properly
Check tire pressure while at station
Clean windshield and mirrors
Check wiper fluid level
Inspect tires for visible damage
Check oil level if needed
Dispose of trash from car
Keep fuel receipt for records

name: EV Car Buying PDI
description: Pre-Delivery Inspection checklist for buying Electric Vehicle in India
items: Verify odometer reading is zero or minimal (under 50 KM)
Check manufacturing date on vehicle sticker/plate
Inspect panel gaps around all body panels evenly
Check panel gaps specifically around headlights
Verify panel gaps around tail lights are uniform
Test adjustable ORVM (Outside Rear View Mirror) switch - left side
Test adjustable ORVM (Outside Rear View Mirror) switch - right side
Check ORVM folding functionality (power fold if available)
Test all buttons on steering wheel (cruise control, audio, phone)
Check steering wheel controls for volume and mode
Test voice command button on steering wheel
Verify headlights (low beam) functioning properly
Verify headlights (high beam) functioning properly
Check front LED DRL (Daytime Running Lights) working
Inspect front LED matrix headlights (if equipped)
Test fog lights front (if available)
Check all turn indicators - front left and right
Check all turn indicators - rear left and right
Test hazard lights functioning properly
Verify brake lights illuminating when brake pressed
Check reverse lights when in reverse gear
Test interior cabin lights and dome lights
Inspect piano finish material on dashboard for scratches
Check piano finish on center console for defects
Verify piano finish on door panels for scratches
Test driver door handle exterior functionality
Test passenger front door handle exterior functionality
Test rear left door handle exterior functionality
Test rear right door handle exterior functionality
Check all door handles interior functionality
Verify door lock and unlock mechanism on all doors
Test central locking system with key fob
Check power windows operation on all doors
Verify auto up/down feature on driver window
Inspect windshield for chips, cracks or distortions
Check rear windshield for any defects
Verify all glass panels for scratches or damage
Test windshield wipers and washer spray
Check rear wiper and washer (if available)
Inspect body paint for scratches or dents
Check paint finish consistency and color match
Verify no dents on bonnet/hood
Check doors, fenders and quarter panels for dents
Inspect roof panel for any damage
Verify boot/trunk lid closes properly and paint is intact
Check underbody for any visible damage or rust
Inspect wheel rims for scratches or dents - all four wheels
Verify tire condition and tread depth on all tires
Check tire manufacturing date (should be recent)
Verify correct tire pressure as per manual
Test horn functionality
Check air conditioning cooling performance
Test heating system (if applicable)
Verify all AC vents open and close smoothly
Test infotainment system and touchscreen responsiveness
Check Bluetooth connectivity with phone
Test USB charging ports functionality
Verify audio system and all speakers working
Check rearview camera display quality
Test parking sensors - front (if available)
Test parking sensors - rear
Verify digital instrument cluster displays correctly
Check all warning lights illuminate during startup
Verify speedometer and other gauges working
Test seat belt functionality on all seats
Check driver seat adjustment - forward/backward
Check driver seat adjustment - height (if available)
Check driver seat adjustment - backrest recline
Verify passenger seat adjustments working
Test rear seat folding mechanism (if applicable)
Check all seat upholstery for tears or stains
Inspect floor mats condition and fitment
Verify carpet and interior trim quality
Check boot/trunk space and spare tire (or repair kit)
Verify jack and tools kit present
Test boot/trunk release mechanism
Check fuel filler cap/charging port door operation
Verify charging cable and adapter provided
Inspect charging port for damage or debris
Test charging port locking mechanism
Check battery charge level display on dashboard
Verify estimated driving range displayed correctly
Test EV mode selector switches (Eco/Normal/Sport if available)
Check regenerative braking level controls
Verify battery cooling system indicator
Test brake pedal feel and response
Check accelerator pedal smooth operation
Verify parking brake engagement and release
Test gear selector operation (D/R/N/P)
Check vehicle pre-conditioning/climate control app
Verify connected car features and app pairing
Test keyless entry system
Check engine start/stop button functionality
Verify all documents: Registration Certificate (RC), Insurance, Purchase Invoice
Check warranty booklet and service schedule
Verify vehicle chassis number matches documents
Check engine number matches documents (if applicable for EV)
Verify all owner manuals provided (vehicle, infotainment, warranty)
Check for any pending software updates available
Verify vehicle delivery checklist signed by dealer
Take photos/videos of vehicle condition for records
Test drive the vehicle before final acceptance
